content: 1 ©2022 little larkspur designs ● simplicity beanie ● all rights reserved cut yarn leaving an 8 tail thread tail through remaining stitches to close the top of the hat weave in loose ends attach a pom pom and your beanie is complete congratulations if you re on instagram use the hashtag #simplicitybeanie and tag me @little larkspur designs so i can see your creations and share what you made this pattern and the photos are property of little larkspur designs they may not be altered sold or shared do not rewrite any part of this design and sell as your own design feel free to sell any simplicity beanies you create using my pattern but i do ask that you give pattern credit to little larkspur designs if you have questions please email me at littlelarkspur@gmail com thank you anna to shop more of my designs on ravelry click here banded braids beanie banded braids beanie lite twisted candy hat page 2 ©2022 little larkspur designs ● simplicity beanie ● all rights reserved
